Title: Relates to sufficient proof that a student enrolled in or admitted to an institution of higher education has a disability
Summary: Requires institutions of higher education to implement a policy that documentation of an individualized education program (IEP) is sufficient proof that a student enrolled in or admitted to an institution of higher education has a disability.
LawCode: Add Art 3 Part 2 ยง150, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to sufficient documentation that a student enrolled in or admitted to an institution of higher education has a disability
